question_text: Which key improvement did USB 3.2 introduce over USB 3.1?
answer_options: Support for two-lane communication for up to 20 Gbps
correct_answer: Support for two-lane communication for up to 20 Gbps
explanation: USB 3.2 allows two-lane operation on USB-C cables, effectively doubling throughput to 20 Gbps in certain modes.
